name: Bartok The Picture Game Free
description:
Classic card game Bartok. Play to unlock images.

3 card sets included:

Amazing Places - 100 levels

Happy Days - 144 levels

Pets and cute animals - 100 levels

You can make your own card sets with this editor:

https://peter-apoguy.itch.io/bartok

System requirements:

64bit  Windows 10

1.5GB hard disk space, 0.5GB RAM

This game will run on any PC that can run Windows 10.
